title: How do I restore data to my phone?
answer:
1. On your computer, click Home Page from the navigation area on the left, then ![](http://app.huawei.com/tkb/ha-i/40dcb_x5lmr.png) to display the restoration page.

2. Select the backup files you want to restore. You can change the backup directory to view backup files in other locations on your computer.

3. Select the data you want to restore.

4. Click Next.
